heading: API Reference
content: The QuantConnect API lets you communicate with our cloud servers through Python or C# methods. To use our URL endpoints instead, see the API Reference.

featureShortDescription.02: Create, read, update, and delete projects
featureShortDescription.03: Create, read, update, and delete files from a project
featureShortDescription.04: Create, read, update, and delete backtests, and read their orders
featureShortDescription.05: Create, and read live algorithms and their orders
featureShortDescription.06: Estimate, create, read, update, abort, and delete optimizations
